data.text:
DistroDirect gives labels and music industry professionals globally the opportunity to open their very own automated, online distribution platform, under their own brand. A market disruptive White Label B2B (Business to Business) SaaS (Software as a Service) solution, DistroDirect puts more power back in the hands of a wide range of industry professionals. Alongside integrated and personalised support services, DistroDirect provides a fully customizable and automated distribution platform, delivering music to over 100 DSPs globally including Spotify, Apple Music, Amazon, Deezer, TikTok and more. The platform allows any music company to add digital distribution to their current business services, to scale their artist network and increase revenue for their business. Each distributor can set their own pricing, royalty rate and customise their website via their dedicated admin panel. Artists are able to create an account, log in to their dashboard and manage their own assets, uploads and royalty withdrawals. The DistroDirect team handles all artist customer support and content deliveries. With an emphasis on premium customer support for both the distributor and artist, DistroDirect's ease of use and a dedicated team prioritises building strong artist relationships - not just a simple data delivery service. The brainchild of leading independent Australian digital distributor GYROstream, DistroDirect is a platform built by a trusted distributor with a proven track record. With offices in Baltimore, Mexico City, Sydney, Brisbane and Melbourne, DistroDirect is expanding its global reach. Offering collaborator split payments, integrated Spotify and Apple Music analytics, extensive reporting, and monthly statements DistroDirect is a modern, robust and customisable system for the modern music industry.

Website

https://www.distro.direct/
